content.text: I went to Stanford University, where I studied business. I have a wife and a 4 year old son. My favorite food is pizza, and my idol is Thierry Henry.
I am in art school studying painting. I aspire to paint murals and love working with acrylics. My favorite class is painting. I have blonde hair.
That's awesome! I love art. My favorite artist is Salvador Dali.
I love Salvador Dali too! He is my inspiration.
What are you working on right now?
I am working on a mural of a woman in a field of flowers.
That sounds beautiful! I would love to see it when it's finished.
I will be sure to let you know.
Great! I'm excited to see it.
So, what else do you like to do besides art?
I like to go hiking, swimming, and reading. I also love to play video games.
That's a lot of hobbies! I like hiking and swimming too. I don't really play video games, but I like to watch them.
That's cool! I'm always looking for new people to play games with.
Maybe we can play a game together sometime.
That would be great! I would love to.
Cool! I'll let you know when I'm free.
Great! I'm looking forward to it.
